name: Wizard fireball defense
description:
Do you have great balls of fire? It’s time to show them. Are you ready fro the epic battle with the Army of Darkness? Play Great Balls of Fire now for free.

Defend you kingdom against hordes of demons, skeletons and evil spirits. Remember to yourself to hold off endless attacks to your castle.

Build towers, which will stand any siege. Kill you enemies in different regimes, earn gold and mana and buy new archers and magic potions.
Cast the spells to protect your lands and stop the dark forces.
Use the wide variety of deadly weapons to defend. Learn new spells, increase you magic level and became the mightest wizard.

Features:
Lightnings, Fireballs, Freezes, Poisons and other abilities.
Different variants to improve your defending force.
Game achievements
Players rating to compete with your friends
Addictive gameplay, great graphics and original soundtrack.
